Package seedu.address.commons.util

Class XmlUtil

    • seedu.address.commons.util.XmlUtil

extends java.lang.Object
    Helps with reading from and writing to XML files.

    • Method Detail

      • getDataFromFile

        public static <T> T getDataFromFile​(java.nio.file.Path file,
                                    java.lang.Class<T> classToConvert)
                             throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                    javax.xml.bind.JAXBException
        Returns the xml data in the file as an object of the specified type.
        Parameters:
        file - Points to a valid xml file containing data that match the classToConvert. Cannot be null.
        classToConvert - The class corresponding to the xml data. Cannot be null.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Thrown if the file is missing.
        javax.xml.bind.JAXBException - Thrown if the file is empty or does not have the correct format.

      • saveDataToFile

        public static <T> void saveDataToFile​(java.nio.file.Path file,
                                      T data)
                               throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                      javax.xml.bind.JAXBException
        Saves the data in the file in xml format.
        Parameters:
        file - Points to a valid xml file containing data that match the classToConvert. Cannot be null.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Thrown if the file is missing.
        javax.xml.bind.JAXBException - Thrown if there is an error during converting the data into xml and writing to the file.
